definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
lit. to hang up a plate/to open up for business/listed (on stock market)
strong card/honor card (card games)/very popular or successful person/self-important
bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
old, well-known brand/old style/old school/an old hand/experienced veteran

sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是絕對改掉牌賭的惡習啦。

sentences.english: Our Salute Brand Coffee is the most popular beverages offered in the market.
sentences.chinese: 海軍牌咖啡，味道香農可口，最受顧客喜愛。

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如氣溫低於此溫度，可使用慧霖牌防凍型玻璃水。

sentences.english: To surrender means to give up half your wager and not complete the hand.
sentences.chinese: 投降就是放棄您一半的賭注同時放棄這局牌。

sentences.english: I won five tricks in that last game.
sentences.chinese: 我最後一局贏了五墩牌。

sentences.english: The mahjong tiles blurred before her eyes. Her heart ached unbearably.
sentences.chinese: 牌在她的眼前晃動起來，她的心痛得厲害。

sentences.english: “Forever” multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 永久牌變速跑車在你們的市場上一定很暢銷。

sentences.english: Draw two cards for yourself. You may use it when is your Action Phase.
sentences.chinese: 出牌階段，對你自己使用，摸兩張牌。

sentences.english: A thirty-year-old workman has already played all the cards in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 三十歲的工人就已經打光了他手中所有的牌。

sentences.english: A rarer gin hand is two sequences of five cards each.
sentences.chinese: 比較少見的“金”是手中有兩副順子，每副五張牌。

sentences.english: Thank you for the support of voice products.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您對聲訊牌產品的支持。

sentences.english: There were a lot of beat-up VW vans around.
sentences.chinese: 周圍有很多破舊的大衆牌汽車。

sentences.english: Shenyang Refrigerator Cars licensing unit series.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽牌冷藏車製冷機組系列。

sentences.english: This is my baggage claim tag.
Use Amway's cooker make dishes not only delicious but also healthy.
sentences.chinese: 安利皇后牌不鏽鋼鍋煮出來的食物不僅美味而且健康。

sentences.english: I have been using a Galanz oven all along, and can tell you that it is quality-guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 我一直使用格蘭仕牌微波爐，質量很有保證。

definition: to bid (bridge and similar card games)
